title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on wool foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, chain, satin, running, and eyelet stitches on plain weave foundation
description: At the top: two alphabets and numerals and one alphabet in groups of three letters in boxes.  Below: "Friendship" poem surrounded by potted flowering plants.  Name and date wreathed in flowers on a vine.  Stylized vine and flower border.
name: Sampler
